title: ABC Pays $15 Million To Settle Trump Defamation Suit
description: ABC News agreed to pay $15 million toward Donald Trump’s presidential library to settle a defamation lawsuit over anchor George Stephanopoulos’ inaccurate on-air assertion that the president-elect had been found civilly liable for raping writer E. Jean Carroll. What do you think? The post ABC Pays $15 Million To Settle Trump Defamation Suit appeared first on The Onion.
author: The Onion Staff
excerpt: ABC News agreed to pay $15 million toward Donald Trump’s presidential library to settle a defamation lawsuit over anchor George Stephanopoulos’ inaccurate on-air assertion that the president-elect had been found civilly liable for raping writer E. Jean Carroll. What do you think?
text: ABC News agreed to pay $15 million toward Donald Trump’s presidential library to settle a defamation lawsuit over anchor George Stephanopoulos’ inaccurate on-air assertion that the president-elect had been found civilly liable for raping writer E. Jean Carroll. What do you think? “A banner day for Trump’s two great loves: the truth and libraries.” Andres Belmonte, Unemployed “Good. You can’t claim Trump raped a woman just because he raped a woman.” Kendall Sabatino, Solitaire Champion “It’s about time somebody stood up for guys whose actions don’t meet the narrow legal definition of rape.” Christian Knopf, Team Namer
html:
ABC News agreed to pay $15 million toward Donald Trump’s presidential library to settle a defamation lawsuit over anchor George Stephanopoulos’ inaccurate on-air assertion that the president-elect had been found civilly liable for raping writer E. Jean Carroll. What do you think?

“A banner day for Trump’s two great loves: the truth and libraries.”

Andres Belmonte, Unemployed

“Good. You can’t claim Trump raped a woman just because he raped a woman.”

Kendall Sabatino, Solitaire Champion

“It’s about time somebody stood up for guys whose actions don’t meet the narrow legal definition of rape.”

Christian Knopf, Team Namer
